summary: Karam is an action film in which a guilt-ridden hit man quits his job after a traumatic killing, before his former boss kidnaps his wife in order to make him do one last job.
cast: John Abraham|Priyanka Chopra|Bharat Dabholkar|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Shiney Ahuja|Anjan Srivastav|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Murli Sharma|Kanwar Pal|Rajesh Khera|Aakash|Nitin Arora|Pear Barsiwala|Ashok Beniwal|Pawan Chopra|Neha|Shree Rammy Pandey|Sanjay Swaraj
title: Karam
